trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Graysville
There were no other sightings in Graysville on or around March 5th 2013
Summary: Saw bright lights out my living room window.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy son & I were watching a movie in my living room when we both saw a bright light out the window that seemed to drop another light then both lights just took off so fast that we couldn't tell which way they went. The lights on these objects were unlike any I have ever witnessed on any kind of aircraft or vehicle. They were brighter than any lights I have ever seen.
